send.description: What Course Builder sends to DevLab microservice

response.description: Fields in the 'response' object that DevLab fills in and returns. Initially sent empty, DevLab populates them.
response.note: DevLab does not send data back to Course Builder (exercises are stored in lessons.devlab_exercises) - response remains empty

receive.description: DevLab does not send data back to Course Builder (exercises are stored in lessons.devlab_exercises)
